detail_desc: Shopper in braided paper straw with two handles at the top and one inner compartment. Strap with shells, wooden beads and tassels fastened to one of the handles. Lined. Size 21x30x51 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a small embroidery detail on the chest, collar with a contrasting colour lining, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
Paper straw hat with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Fishnet stay-ups with a wide lace trim with silicone at the top.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, and three elastic straps with a fastening at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a pattern on the front and deep neckline at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a stretch cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated, frilled trim at the shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in tulle with sequined embroidery, a seam at the waist, press-studs at the back and flared tulle skirt. Lined.
Slip-on trainers with elastication and a decoration at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Long, raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Loose fit.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the leg, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and raw-edge hems.
Fine-knit, V-neck sweater vest in soft cotton.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, elasticated waist.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in a viscose weave containing some linen with a resort collar, French front and short sleeves. Yoke at the back and a straight-cut hem. Relaxed fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Set with a hat and pair of mittens in soft pile. Hat with appliqués at the top. Mittens with appliqués on the front and elasticated cuffs. Jersey lining.
V-neck top in ribbed jersey with a decorative knot detail on the shoulder straps.
Thong briefs in lace with ties at the sides. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.

Bomber jacket in patterned satin with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, welt side pockets and covered elastication at the hem. Lined.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Stripes with a text print down the sides. Mesh inner shorts.
Sleeveless top in ribbed jersey with a high, ribbed collar and a zip at the top with a ring pull.
Cotton jersey vest tops with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Short jersey top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck, lined cups and a seam under the bust.
High-waisted jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a visible button fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Hat in soft, cable-knit cashmere with a faux fur pompom on top.
Soft, non-wired microfibre bra with lace details and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, rib-knit merino wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal Alice band with attachments on the top.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped trims.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves. Contrasting colour trim around the neckline and sleeves.

Padded gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar with press-studs and a zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, pockets in the side seams with a button, and one inner pocket with a button. Polyester filling. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length, waterproof rubber boots with a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Cargo trousers in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved satin blouse with a V-neck, pleat at the front and slits at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved lace top with a small stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Thong briefs in ribbed cotton jersey with a high, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and string back.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Cargo shorts in a linen and cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Front and back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Mesh trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.

Knee-length, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist with a gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides, and a gathered, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Puffer gilet in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and a rounded hem.
Vest top in soft, marled jersey with a chest pocket and raw, roll edges around the neckline and armholes.
Underwired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide, drawstring waistband and cuffed hems.
Cap in a cotton weave with a practical flap at the back to protect the ears and neck.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with a small, gathered stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front and rounded hem.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front and seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Concealed zip and at the back, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.
Padded fancy dress costume made of velour and jersey in the shape of a slice of pizza.

Shirt in soft, stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.

Shirt in an airy patterned weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening with concealed buttons at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, gathers on the shoulders, long sleeves with narrow, frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length, sleeveless lace dress with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a flared skirt with a raw-edge, scalloped hem. Jersey lining.
Double-layered sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Baby Exclusive. Balaclava in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with sewn-on ears at the top. Jersey lining.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Sandals in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the ankle. Imitation leather insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved blouse in silk crêpe with a V-neck and collar with ties at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, covered buttons at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.

Short, A-line dress in crinkled chiffon with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Long puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. V-neck underdress in jersey made from recycled polyester with narrow shoulder straps.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round, scallop-edged neckline and long sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist, a gently flared skirt and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck with ties at the front, and a square neckline at the back. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Flounces around the neckline front and back, and a seam at the waist.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. T-shirt top in jersey with a round neck. Piqué shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

LIMITED EDITION. Calf-length kaftan in a soft viscose weave with broderie anglaise and a heavy drape. Small stand-up collar, opening at the top with a hook-and-eye fastener, pleat at the back and slits in the sides of the hem.
